content.description:
Squeeze through the other small corridor tunnel opposite of the "List of Demands" tunnel to exit on the backside of the Evil Boulder. There you will see the perched, rounded back arete.

 Sit start under the bulge matched on the rounded in-set sloper. Toss high up to better holds and follow good irons to the high top. Dont fall. Pads wont help if you do.
content.protection: pads if they make you feel better!

content.description:
In the corridor (formed by Evil, List, Choob and Vanishing Boulders) this marks the beautiful, downhill-most face with the single scooped jug in the middle. Stand start high matched in the scooped jug.

 Climb through a series of thin iron edges to a rounded rail below the lip. Find good edges at the lip and mantle. The mantle wasn't as easy as you might hope for, so be ready for that.

This is the full, proud line of the corridor and the sit start to "Cloak Stand".Â Find the high starting jug to "Cloak Stand" and follow the steepness down to the long round ledge at the low base of the boulder. Start with hands on side-by-side seams at the low ledge. Toss up to the higher rail, then work up direct into the jug for the stand and finish as per.

Big and beautiful, Evil touches the lip of Chooby as you scramble through the low tunnel leading into the corridor. The corridor is made up of List Boulder, Evil, Chooby and Vanishing. Evil has the big low roof in the corridor.
